343290.name: PARTICLE MACE - Soundtrack
343290.description:
The killer PARTICLE MACE Soundtrack by Nathaniel Chambers, including two bonus tracks.

1. Trail Blazer
2. Safely Proceed
3. Rewarding Experience Points
4. The Hunt
5. Friendly Whiplash
6. Through Barriers
7. In the Zone (Mace Mix) (Bonus Track)
8. Them Dance Pants (Mace Mix) (Bonus Track)

Enjoy it at home. Enjoy when out and about. Enjoy it any time you choose. It your power to decide once you buy the PARTICLE MACE Soundtrack by Nathaniel Chambers!

More of Nathaniel's music can be found at
343290.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
